sys_script_include.description: Ein Script Include zur Überprüfung, ob der aktuelle Benutzer eine bestimmte Rolle hat.
sys_script_include.name: UserRoleUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_37d691bd83685650e4af6170deaad3b2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1521148_borrowno.UserRoleUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Ein Script Include zur Überprüfung, ob der aktuelle Benutzer eine bestimmte Rolle hat.</description><name>UserRoleUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var UserRoleChecker = Class.create();
UserRoleChecker.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
  checkUserRole: function() {
    var roleName = this.getParameter('role_name');
    var user = gs.getUser(); // Holt den aktuellen Benutzer
    
    return user.hasRole(roleName) ? 'true' : 'false';
  }
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>amine</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-10 14:00:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>37d691bd83685650e4af6170deaad3b2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UserRoleUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BorrowNOW" source="x_1521148_borrowno">d400f82383141210e4af6170deaad331</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BorrowNOW">d400f82383141210e4af6170deaad331</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_37d691bd83685650e4af6170deaad3b2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>amine</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-10 14:42:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
